articles.description: Follow 5 Live commentary, score & text updates from round three of the Carabao Cup as Newcastle host Man City plus eight other fixtures.
articles.title: EFL Cup: Nine games including Newcastle v Man City & Chelsea v Brighton

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary of Rangers v Livingston and follow text update of Wednesday's three Viaplay Cup quarter-finals.
articles.title: Viaplay Cup quarter-finals: Six top-flight teams in action

articles.description: Follow commentary, score & text updates from La Liga as Real Madrid host Las Palmas.
articles.title: La Liga: Real Madrid v Las Palmas

articles.description: Aston Villa's women's players are "dreading" their first match of the WSL season because of the club's shirts, says Jacqui Oatley.
articles.title: Aston Villa 'dreading' WSL opener because of shirts

articles.description: Chelsea captain Reece James is charged by the Football Association for an alleged incident in the tunnel after their defeat by Aston Villa.
articles.title: Chelsea's James charged for alleged tunnel incident

articles.description: Uruguay beat Namibia to record their first pool win at the Rugby World Cup in Lyon and deny the African nation a first win in the competition.
articles.title: Uruguay beat Namibia for first win of World Cup

articles.description: BBC Sport visits Stamford Bridge to explore Chelsea's recruitment strategy, the club's unprecedented spending spree, and the ambitions of chairman Todd Boehly.
articles.title: What's the big idea behind Chelsea's £1bn spending spree?

articles.description: Andrew Flintoff is set be involved in England's coaching set-up again in the future, says limited-overs head coach Matthew Mott.
articles.title: Flintoff will 'definitely' join England set-up again

articles.description: Former Wales and Real Madrid player Gareth Bale tees off in a Ryder Cup celebrity all-star event, featuring tennis star Novak Djokovic, former AC Milan footballer Andriy Shevchenko and Ferrari's Formula One driver Carlos Sainz at the Marco Simone Golf & Country Club in Rome.
articles.title: Bale tees off in Ryder Cup celeb all-star match

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says he was left in tears after a video message from caddie Harry Diamond was played at Monday's Ryder Cup Team Europe meeting.
articles.title: McIlroy's 'tears' after caddie Diamond's video
